text:
Life OK was a Hindi Language Indian Television Channel based in India a part of Star India. Which was fully owned by 21st Century Fox.
The channel launched on 11 December 2011.and is distributed many parts of the world.
The channel replaced Star India's now defunct youth oriented channel STAR One. The channel underwent an indantify change on 28 Against 2017 by replacing Life OK the entire channel name and branding has been changed and the channel known as Star Bharat.
